sourcesContent:
<template>


    <el-form :inline="true" :model="msg" class="demo-form-inline">
        <el-form-item label="学生ID">
            <el-input v-model="msg.sId" placeholder="审批人"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="学生名称">
            <el-input v-model="msg.sName" placeholder="审批人"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="年级">
            <el-input v-model="msg.grade.cname" placeholder="审批人"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="java成绩">
            <el-input v-model="msg.Acj" placeholder="审批人"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="Android成绩">
            <el-input v-model="msg.Bcj" placeholder="审批人"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="javaEE成绩">
            <el-input v-model="msg.Ccj" placeholder="审批人"></el-input>
        </el-form-item> 
        <el-form-item>
            <el-button type="primary" @click="onSubmit">查询</el-button>
        </el-form-item>
    </el-form>

</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'queryBox',
    data() {
        return {
            msg: {
                sId:"",
                s
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        onSubmit() {
            console.log('submit!');
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style  scoped>

</style>
